item.description:
Hi Everyone...

Our next Sunday Brunch will be @ 3:00PM on February 1st at:

29 Newbury Restaurant (The Back Bay)
29 Newbury St.
Boston, MA
(617) 536-0290
Price: Reasonable
www.29newbury.com (check them out on the web)

I hope to see you at 29 Newbury St!

Cheers,
Michael
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be under Mike/Meet up
